ygData.subject: Re: other goodies? **possible spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a gnome there, he hangs around the ruins. i know because he killed me, the first time i seen him i was fighting a skele then.  i seen him again but
ygData.messageBody:
There is a gnome there, he hangs around the ruins. i know because he killed
me, the first time i seen him
i was fighting a skele then. i seen him again but this time he did not kill
me, but he did come by the ruins and
he charmed all of the putrids that were there and walked of with them
following. just wanted to say he is there
but only sometimes, might be certain days.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 07, 1999 7:45 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] other goodies? **possible spoiler**


>From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
>oh I know he is not a gnome... but I have never killed him so I don't know
>what he has... I was just referring to the necromancer post that was a
>reply to the gnome post...
>
>Rutreeii
>
